name: 511 Transit Incentives
description: Free $25 Clipper card for taking transit pledge
fullDescription: 511 Contra Costa offers incentives to encourage workers and students to try public transit, providing free Clipper card value when you commit to taking transit.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free $25 Clipper card for taking the transit pledge
- One-time incentive to try transit
- Can be used on any transit agency that accepts Clipper
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the 511 Contra Costa website
2. Complete the transit pledge online
3. Must work or attend college in Contra Costa County
4. Receive $25 Clipper card by mail or at designated pickup location
